data.text:
No. 1 American Radio App

****Features****

Easy interface.

- Background playing mode.

- Radio list & Easy Exit.

- Option to add channels in favorite.

Listen to your favorite radio stations wherever you are with Radio USA .

The functionality of Radio USA App are a must apply:

Listening to your radio wherever you are in the background allowing you to use your phone to do other things at the same time

A simple interface , sleek and intuitive to use that makes your available radios in only 1 click

The update continuously your radios depending on your needs and what you want to hear.

One click listened to more than 200 radio stations regularly updated days according to your desires.

This application requires a mobile internet connection or wifi.
